title: N8N Production Workflows Created
description: Created 4 production-ready N8N automation workflows: 1) webhook-processing-workflow.json (Humanitix/Eventbrite webhooks → Supabase → Slack), 2) social-media-automation-workflow.json (Cron → Content → Metricool posting), 3) content-generation-workflow.json (Event creation → AI content → Review → Publish), 4) database-sync-workflow.json (Supabase changes → Linear sync → GitHub updates). All workflows tested and ready for deployment. N8N operational at localhost:5678/rest/
